thread.section_title: TrustedHousesitters Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of TrustedHousesitters | www.trustedhousesitters.com
thread.title: Glenys Mitchell

author: Glenys Mitchell
title: Glenys Mitchell
text:
The website was easy to negotiate around, reasonably priced to join and we seem to get an excellent response to our request for housesitters.
Good communication from site on email advising when there had been new contacts made to us via the site.
Joining fee certainly paid for itself in savings having to put our pets into care.
Would certainly recommend this site.
